data.title: River City & Hoosier Pride
data.text: I stopped in on my lunch hour, a couple of weeks ago, and really liked what I saw. Many items feature the shape of Indiana, or bordering states, the state flag, or other emblems of pride for our state and city. I purchased a couple of stickers that say Evansville River City, that look like the round center pieces of the Main Street archways. The store also has a lot of locally made, or locally designed, items. They had a nice variety of things available the day I was there. Sunshine Juice is located in the back of the store. I'll have to return another day and try their cold press juice.
